statements: SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention;
SELECT id, username, email FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention;
SELECT id, username, email FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention WHERE id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT id, password FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention;
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention WHERE username = 'admin' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention ORDER BY username DESC, id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, username, email FROM SQL_Injection_Prevention WHERE password = 'password123' OR username LIKE 'user%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND username LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND username = 'admin' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 AND product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 200.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM Orders WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT U.username, P.product_name, O.quantity FROM Users U JOIN Orders O ON U.user_id = O.user_id JOIN Products P ON O.product_id = P.product_id;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 2 AND total_price < 100.00 ORDER BY total_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM Products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Orders WHERE total_price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Admins WHERE role = 'super_admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.perm_id = p.perm_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.perm_id = p.perm_id WHERE u.id = 5;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS num_roles FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_roles > 2;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON rp.perm_id = p.perm_id WHERE u.id = 3;
